A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed this movie from start to finish.  The differences in the film made it new and fresh from beginning to end.  I understand the negativity to the degree that people don't want it to change\, they want it a particular way.  But as someone who understands that things need to change\, things need to be turned on their heads\, I liked it.\nSee it\, and don't fall prey to the negativity.
